titleStmt.title: Iohn Arm-strongs last good-night. Declaring how John Arm-strong and his eightscore men, fought a bloody bout with a Scottish king at Edenborough. To a pretty northern tune, called, Fare thou well Giltknock-hall.
titleStmt.author: T. R.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
